title: The Swamp Between Worlds

panel_structure.description: The void transforms into a liminal wetland—neither solid ground nor open water, boundaries dissolving and reforming, consciousness as living ecosystem
Close-up of the swamp boundary shifting with weather patterns—mood as climate, thoughts as organisms crossing permeable membranes between self and world

transformation_notes: The Architect's most sophisticated metaphor—replacing Cartesian dualism with ecological thinking. Mind and world meet in a living, breathing wetland of experience.
